87505.text: kubeadm: apply further improvements to the tentative support for concurrent etcd member join. Fixes a bug where multiple members can receive the same hostname. Increase the etcd client dial timeout and retry timeout for add/remove/... operations.
87505.markdown: Kubeadm: apply further improvements to the tentative support for concurrent etcd member join. Fixes a bug where multiple members can receive the same hostname. Increase the etcd client dial timeout and retry timeout for add/remove/... operations. ([#87505](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/87505), [@neolit123](https://github.com/neolit123)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]
87505.author: neolit123

87730.text: Kubelet metrics gathered through metrics-server or prometheus should no longer timeout for Windows nodes running more than 3 pods.
87730.markdown: Kubelet metrics gathered through metrics-server or prometheus should no longer timeout for Windows nodes running more than 3 pods. ([#87730](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/87730), [@marosset](https://github.com/marosset)) [SIG Node, Testing and Windows]
87730.author: marosset

88360.text: fix: check disk status before delete azure disk
88360.markdown: Fix: check disk status before delete azure disk ([#88360](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/88360), [@andyzhangx](https://github.com/andyzhangx)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
88360.author: andyzhangx

88586.text: Fix failing conformance when using docker container runtime w/ the docker/journald logging driver. #87933
88586.markdown: Fix failing conformance when using docker container runtime w/ the docker/journald logging driver. #87933 ([#88586](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/88586), [@jdef](https://github.com/jdef)) [SIG Node]
88586.author: jdef

88915.text: Fixed a data race in kubelet image manager that can cause static pod workers to silently stop working.
88915.markdown: Fixed a data race in kubelet image manager that can cause static pod workers to silently stop working. ([#88915](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/88915), [@roycaihw](https://github.com/roycaihw)) [SIG Node]
88915.author: roycaihw

88995.text: Fixes conversion error in multi-version custom resources that could cause metadata.generation to increment on no-op patches or updates of a custom resource.
88995.markdown: Fixes conversion error in multi-version custom resources that could cause metadata.generation to increment on no-op patches or updates of a custom resource. ([#88995](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/88995), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery]
88995.author: liggitt

89002.text: Fix invalid VMSS updates due to incorrect cache
89002.markdown: Fix invalid VMSS updates due to incorrect cache ([#89002](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89002), [@ArchangelSDY](https://github.com/ArchangelSDY)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
89002.author: ArchangelSDY

89055.text: Fixed an issue that could cause the kubelet to incorrectly run concurrent pod reconciliation loops and crash.
89055.markdown: Fixed an issue that could cause the kubelet to incorrectly run concurrent pod reconciliation loops and crash. ([#89055](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89055), [@tedyu](https://github.com/tedyu)) [SIG Node]
89055.author: tedyu

89117.text: kube-proxy no longer modifies shared EndpointSlices and will not break with EndpointSlice feature gate enabled on Windows.
89117.markdown: Kube-proxy no longer modifies shared EndpointSlices and will not break with EndpointSlice feature gate enabled on Windows. ([#89117](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89117), [@robscott](https://github.com/robscott)) [SIG Network]
89117.author: robscott

89118.text: EndpointSlice controller now handles terminating pods correctly and is better at preventing race conditions.
89118.markdown: EndpointSlice controller now handles terminating pods correctly and is better at preventing race conditions. ([#89118](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89118), [@robscott](https://github.com/robscott)) [SIG Apps and Network]
89118.author: robscott

89239.text: For volumes that allow attaches across multiple nodes, attach and detach operations across different nodes are now executed in parallel.
89239.markdown: For volumes that allow attaches across multiple nodes, attach and detach operations across different nodes are now executed in parallel. ([#89239](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89239), [@verult](https://github.com/verult)) [SIG Apps, Node and Storage]
89239.author: verult

89337.text: Fix the VMSS name and resource group name when updating Azure VMSS for LoadBalancer backendPools
89337.markdown: Fix the VMSS name and resource group name when updating Azure VMSS for LoadBalancer backendPools ([#89337](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89337), [@feiskyer](https://github.com/feiskyer)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
89337.author: feiskyer

89399.text:
- deps: Update to Golang 1.13.9
- build: Remove kube-cross image building
89399.markdown:
- deps: Update to Golang 1.13.9
  - build: Remove kube-cross image building ([#89399](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89399), [@justaugustus](https://github.com/justaugustus)) [SIG Release, Storage and Testing]
89399.author: justaugustus

89722.text: Ensure Azure availability zone is always in lower cases.
89722.markdown: Ensure Azure availability zone is always in lower cases. ([#89722](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89722), [@feiskyer](https://github.com/feiskyer)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
89722.author: feiskyer

89794.text: Reduce event spam during a volume operation error.
89794.markdown: Reduce event spam during a volume operation error. ([#89794](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89794), [@msau42](https://github.com/msau42)) [SIG Storage]
89794.author: msau42

89805.text: Fixed the EndpointSlice controller to run without error on a cluster with the OwnerReferencesPermissionEnforcement validating admission plugin enabled.
89805.markdown: Fixed the EndpointSlice controller to run without error on a cluster with the OwnerReferencesPermissionEnforcement validating admission plugin enabled. ([#89805](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89805), [@marun](https://github.com/marun)) [SIG Auth and Network]
89805.author: marun

89902.text: For GCE cluster provider, fix bug of not being able to create internal type load balancer for clusters with more than 1000 nodes in a single zone.
89902.markdown: For GCE cluster provider, fix bug of not being able to create internal type load balancer for clusters with more than 1000 nodes in a single zone. ([#89902](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89902), [@wojtek-t](https://github.com/wojtek-t)) [SIG Cloud Provider, Network and Scalability]

89967.text: Fixes conversion error for HorizontalPodAutoscaler objects with invalid annotations
89967.markdown: Fixes conversion error for HorizontalPodAutoscaler objects with invalid annotations ([#89967](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89967), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG Autoscaling]
89967.author: liggitt

89970.text: Restores priority of static control plane pods in the cluster/gce/manifests control-plane manifests
89970.markdown: Restores priority of static control plane pods in the cluster/gce/manifests control-plane manifests ([#89970](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89970), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle and Node]
89970.author: liggitt

89976.text: client-go: resolves an issue with informers falling back to full list requests when timeouts are encountered, rather than re-establishing a watch.
89976.markdown: Client-go: resolves an issue with informers falling back to full list requests when timeouts are encountered, rather than re-establishing a watch. ([#89976](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89976), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery and Testing]

90020.text: Fixes a bug defining a default value for a replicas field in a custom resource definition that has the scale subresource enabled

90024.text: Fixes kubectl apply/prune in namespace other than default.
90024.markdown: Fixes kubectl apply/prune in namespace other than default. ([#90024](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90024), [@seans3](https://github.com/seans3)) [SIG CLI and Testing]
90024.author: seans3

90032.text: Fix bug where sending a status update completely wipes managedFields for some types.
90032.markdown: Fix bug where sending a status update completely wipes managedFields for some types. ([#90032](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90032), [@apelisse](https://github.com/apelisse)) [SIG API Machinery and Testing]
